name: cmdstan

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: CmdStan is the command line interface to Stan.

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description:
Intel MPI Library is a multifabric message-passing library that
implements the open-source MPICH specification. Use the library to
create, maintain, and test advanced, complex applications that perform
better on high-performance computing (HPC) clusters based on Intel
processors. LICENSE INFORMATION: By downloading and using this software,
you agree to the terms and conditions of the software license agreements
at https://intel.ly/393CijO.

dependent_to.name: r-cmdstanr
dependent_to.description:
R Interface to 'CmdStan'. A lightweight interface to 'Stan' <https://mc-
stan.org>. The 'CmdStanR' interface is an alternative to 'RStan' that
calls the command line interface for compilation and running algorithms
instead of interfacing with C++ via 'Rcpp'. This has many benefits
including always being compatible with the latest version of Stan, fewer
installation errors, fewer unexpected crashes in RStudio, and a more
permissive license.
